text: Druz'ya, kotorykh ob"yedinila lozh' v etoy zhizni, budut vragami drug drugu v tot Den', kogda vnezapno ikh nastignet Sudnyy chas. I prervotsya vsyakaya druzheskaya privyazannost', krome privyazannosti tekh, kotoryye v zemnom mire boyalis' nakazaniya Allakha i byli ob"yedineny poslushaniyem Yemu
